name: Camp St. Andrews
description: Founded in 1970, Camp St. Andrews San Bruno is an unforgettable, week-long, traditional summer camp in the High Sierras.
fullDescription: Founded in 1970, Camp St. Andrews San Bruno is an unforgettable, week-long, traditional summer camp in the High Sierras.
whatTheyOffer: Founded in 1970, Camp St. Andrews San Bruno is an unforgettable, week-long, traditional summer camp in the High Sierras.
